newsitem.title: USA: Pacific Animated unit forms partnership.
newsitem.headline: Pacific Animated unit forms partnership.

text.p: Pacific Animated Imaging Corp said Thursday that its subsidiary, U.S. Technologies, entered into a partnership with BBN Planet, a unit of BBN Corp.

Pacific Animated said in a release Thursday that the U.S. Technology/BBN Planet partnership would "significantly enhance the revenue growth that made U.S. Technology an attractive acquisition" earlier this year.
Pacific Animated said BBN Planet has a "comprehensive suite of service offerings which fully complements U.S. Technologies' value proposition."
U.S. Technologies said that it will be reselling BBN Planet's products to its (U.S. Technologies') client base.
Shares of Pacific Animated were up 5/8 at 13-1/8, while BBN Corp shares were down 3/4 at 19-3/4 in late morning trading Thursday.
